column2: SHAMROCK INTERNATIONAL SCHOOL is looking for Yoga Instructor to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     As a Yoga Instructor, your role is to guide and instruct individuals or groups in various yoga practices to promote physical and mental well-being         Here are some key responsibilities and tasks typically associated with being a Yoga Instructor:         Teaching Yoga Classes: You lead yoga classes, guiding participants through various yoga poses (asanas), breathing exercises (pranayama), and meditation techniques     You create a safe and supportive environment for students of different levels and abilities     Lesson Planning: You develop lesson plans that include a sequence of yoga poses and techniques suitable for the specific class or group     You consider factors such as the participants' experience, fitness levels, and any specific needs or goals they may have     Demonstration and Instruction: You demonstrate yoga poses and techniques, explaining and instructing students on proper alignment, breathing techniques, and modifications to accommodate different abilities or limitations     You provide clear verbal instructions and physical cues to help students understand and perform the poses correctly     Safety and Injury Prevention: You prioritize safety during yoga classes, ensuring that students practice within their limits and avoid potential injuries     You offer modifications or variations of poses to accommodate individual needs and provide guidance on proper body alignment and technique to minimize the risk of injury     Providing Guidance and Support: As a Yoga Instructor, you offer guidance and support to students, encouraging them to explore their own practice, develop mindfulness, and cultivate a positive mindset     You provide verbal cues and gentle corrections to help students deepen their practice and improve their technique

column2: Job Title  Yoga Instructor (East European Origin) Job Description We are looking to employ an experienced and certified yoga instructor with knowledge of the history, philosophy, and ethics of yoga.
